lead_paragraph: Some fellow travelers think being an ESPN basketball analyst is the best job in America. Carolyn Peck says she loves her job, but it’s not always glamorous.
snippet: Some fellow travelers think being an ESPN basketball analyst is the best job in America. Carolyn Peck says she loves her job, but it’s not always glamorous.

headline.main: A Diverted Flight, a Drowsy Bus Driver
headline.seo: Carolyn Peck of ESPN, Talking Basketball in the Air - Frequent Flier
headline.print_headline: A Diverted Flight, A Drowsy Bus Driver
